title: The recent struggles of top AI stocks show investors are realizing they were 'sold a bill of goods,' AI scientist says
full_text: The recent struggles of top AI stocks show investors are realizing they were 'sold a bill of goods,' AI scientist says. AI scientist Gary Marcus thinks the underwhelming release of ChatGPT-5 marked a turning point when investors realized AI might not be a game changer.. With names like Nvidia, Oracle, and CoreWeave down double digits in the last few months, the AI trade appears to be stuck in a rut. But far from a temporary blip, the diminished fortunes of the mar… [+2762 chars]
